heading: Look at Gaming #96
special_insights:
powered by AppMagic.rocks 😎
Did you know Finland's top income earners are in the gaming industry?  Some of the top publishers are Supercell, Rovio, Metacore Games Oy, Seriously Digital Entertainment, and Kitka Games.  In 2022 YTD, the total revenue from these 5 publishers is $1.35B with 500M downloads.
